originalText.text: Love Lia Trojansky! One of the only people I trust with my skin and I'm very particular. She's not only very knowledgeable but she's compassionate and a master of her craft. Always look forward to seeing her.

text.text: Love Lia Trojansky! One of the only people I trust with my skin and I'm very particular. She's not only very knowledgeable but she's compassionate and a master of her craft. Always look forward to seeing her.

originalText.text: I have been going to see Lia Trojansky, PC-A for years now for both cosmetic and medical dermatological needs. She continues to give me best-in-class care and always provides helpful insights. The office staff is professional and friendly as well - I am always seen right away. I only have positive things to share about my experience with Dr. Dennis Gross Dermatology!

text.text: I have been going to see Lia Trojansky, PC-A for years now for both cosmetic and medical dermatological needs. She continues to give me best-in-class care and always provides helpful insights. The office staff is professional and friendly as well - I am always seen right away. I only have positive things to share about my experience with Dr. Dennis Gross Dermatology!

originalText.text: Over a decade of care for my family of five, and it is always flawless! I love the staff and Dr. Gross and Dr. Reich. They are so helpful and user-friendly and very wise and conservative. I cannot recommend them highly enough.

text.text: Over a decade of care for my family of five, and it is always flawless! I love the staff and Dr. Gross and Dr. Reich. They are so helpful and user-friendly and very wise and conservative. I cannot recommend them highly enough.

originalText.text: I have been cared for by Dr. Dennis Gross for many years, and always receive thorough, professional care. Since I was a sun lover for many years, I develop skin cancers, especially on my face. Dr. Gross is such a great surgeon, my scars are barely visible.  Plus he is so kind and reassuring, as is his staff.

text.text: I have been cared for by Dr. Dennis Gross for many years, and always receive thorough, professional care. Since I was a sun lover for many years, I develop skin cancers, especially on my face. Dr. Gross is such a great surgeon, my scars are barely visible.  Plus he is so kind and reassuring, as is his staff.

originalText.text: Absolutely exceptional! I initially came to Dr. Gross seeking treatment for stubborn acne. I immediately loved his approach and his product plan, both of which cleared up my skin.  From there I began seeing his Director of Aesthetics, Courtney Brooks for skin maintenance and anti-aging treatments.  She is truly one of a kind, professional and brilliant. She created a skincare regime for me and I saw almost immediate results in tightening and brightening. Now I take great care of my skin and rarely wear makeup. I get so many compliments, all thanks to them!
